title: No bake cheesecake with black cherry topping
ingredients: ['50g (2 oz) butter', '110g (4 oz) digestive or ginger biscuits, crushed', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '225g (8 oz) cream cheese', '150ml (1/4 pt) double cream', 'Topping', '210g (7 1/2 oz) black cherries, pitted', '3 tablespoons cornflour', '2 teaspoons sugar']
